attributes.action: Publish the variation in money spent on managers in hospitals and Trusts
attributes.additional_details:
Excessive amounts of money are spent on management in PCTs and hospitals with few outcomes for their roles. Each manager often comes with their own PA and assistant managers hence compounding costs.

We can highlight the variation and amount of money spent on management rather than front line NHS care where money should be spent.

This is a simple and easily achievable request
